A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I’m an avid Star Wars fan and I don’t understand the really mixed reviews of this film. Was it overhyped? Yes. Did it completely meet expectations? No. But it was overall a gold Star Wars movie. The biggest problem that I have with this film is the clunky build up to craft the story. If could have certainly been stream-lined and more effectively set up the mind-blowing last hour of the film. People are complaining about Rey’s parentage and snoke’s death and so on and so forth\, but remember\, there is another film in this saga\, and I have a feeling there is more information to come. Overall it was fun and exciting with many cool\, new signature Star Wars moments. It deserves more credit from audiences than it is getting.
